original: ayedānīṃ brahmavidyārthasya madhukāṇḍasya vaṃśaḥ stutyartho brahmavidyāyāḥ /
analyzed: ayā idānīm brahmavidyā arthasya madhu kāṇḍasya vaṃśaḥ stuti arthaḥ brahmavidyāyāḥ
mantraḥ ca ayam svādhyāya arthaḥ japa arthaḥ ca

original: tatra vaṃśa iva vaṃśaḥ yathā veṇurvaṃśaḥ parvaṇaḥ parvaṇo hi bhidyate tadvadagratprabhṛti āmūlaprāpterayaṃ vaṃśaḥ /
analyzed: tatra vaṃśaḥ iva vaṃśaḥ yathā veṇuḥ vaṃśaḥ parvaṇaḥ parvaṇaḥ hi bhidyate tadvat agrat prabhṛti ā mūla prāpteḥ ayam vaṃśaḥ
adhyāya catuṣṭayasya ācārya paramparā kramaḥ vaṃśaḥ iti ucyate
tatra prathama antaḥ śiṣyaḥ pañcama yantaḥ ācāryaḥ
parameṣṭhī virāj
brāhmaṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbhāt
tatas parama ācārya paramparā nā asti
